The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Tuesday 

Black Beans Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (black bean, celery, carrot, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Quinoa with Stir–fry Vegetables – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g  (quinoa, coconut milk, champinion mushrooms, red bell pepper, zucchini, carrot, celery, red onion, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Hemp seeds & Tomato Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (white onion, millet, tomato, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Strawberries & Chocolate Cake – raw / gluten free /110 g (Strawberries, cashew, natural cocoa , alkaline cocoa, vanilla, orange, cocoa butter, unfiltered honey)
